item.title: Seventy WPM typists can't tell you where keys are on the QWERTY keyboard
item.description:
Typists who clear 70 wpm can’t even say where the keys are

The majority of typists couldn’t tell you how they type if they tried, according to a study published in October in the scientific journal Attention, Perception, and Pschyophysics. The finding comes from a body of typists …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
